sentences.sContent: You can narrow the odds of a nasty accident happening in your home by being more safety-conscious.
sentences.sCn: 增强安全意识可以减少家中发生意外危险的可能性。

sentences.sContent: The odds against a plane crash are around a million to one.
sentences.sCn: 发生空难的可能性仅有约百万分之一。

sentences.sContent: I’m afraid that the odds are heavily against her winning (= it is not likely ).
sentences.sCn: 恐怕她获胜的可能性很小。

phrases.pCn: 与…争执，意见不一致；与…不和；差异
尽管有极大的困难；尽管极为不利
极不均等的赌注；极为偶然的机会

trans.tranOther: how likely it is that something will or will not happen
